title: Nouakchott International Airport
text: Nouakchott International Airport () was an <a href="airport">airport</a> located in <a href="Nouakchott">Nouakchott</a>, the capital of <a href="Mauritania">Mauritania</a>. It closed in June 2016 upon the opening of <a href="Nouakchott%E2%80%93Oumtounsy%20International%20Airport">Nouakchott–Oumtounsy International Airport</a>, north of the city. Until late 2010, the airport served as <a href="airline%20hub">hub</a> of <a href="Mauritania%20Airways">Mauritania Airways</a>. <a href="Mauritania%20Airlines%20International">Mauritania Airlines International</a> was based at the airport until the closure.
